column1: fuller around off, pushed towards the left of the bowler, a fumble there allows the single
fuller around off, driven towards long-on for one more
pitched up again, pushed towards midwicket
fuller and wider, goes for the drive but straight to the cover fielder
pitched up on middle and leg, driven wide of long-on, comes back for the second
length outside off, some turn as well, Dunk pushes at it and gets beaten
almost a yorker, digs it out towards mid-off
length ball on the stumps, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
length around off, stays back and works it towards mid-on for one more
length outside off, goes for the cut and misses
length, drifting down the leg side, Dunk goes for a flick but misses, loses his balance and the keeper breaks the stumps. Referred upstairs but Dunk's foot was grounded behind the line
short of length, wide outside off and spinning away, cuts it towards cover-point
length around off, almost chipped back to the bowler, was early into the shot, lands short of Mujeeb
length outside off, angling away and left alone
short of length on middle and leg, tucked away but straight to short fine leg
fuller around off, Stoinis clears his front leg and lofts it over mid-off, a couple of bounces and over the boundary line
short of length, doesn't bounce much, pulled towards fine leg for a couple
short of length on middle and leg, pushed towards midwicket
slower one around off and middle, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
length around off and middle, goes back and flicks it towards midwicket
fuller on the stumps, driven towards wide long-on for a couple, almost a collision between the two fielders converging in from long-on and deep midwicket
length on middle and leg, spinning further down, Stoinis misses the flick
length but further down this time and called a wide
length on the pads again, brushes the pads on its way to short fine leg
short of length outside off, goes back and punches it towards covers, a diving stop by Doggett
short of length outside off, cuts it off the back foot for a couple
length on middle and leg, goes for the pull but misses, gets hit on the thigh
fuller around off, goes for the drive. The extra cover fielder intercepts to keep it to one
length but down the leg side, called a wide
length, on the pads once more and this time helped on its way past the short fine leg
back of length around off, punched towards mid-on for a quick run
short of length on the stumps, goes for the pull but gets an inside edge on to the pads
fuller outside off, looks to cut it hard but no connection with the bat
slower one around off, Stoinis was early into the pull, ends up hitting it back towards the bowler
length around off, punches it towards mid-off and scampers across for a single
back of length around off, stays back and chops it towards covers
length around off, dragged over midwicket, the deep square leg fielder puts in the chase but cannot stop the boundary
short of length and pulled away past midwicket, much better connection this time. Back to back fours for Stoinis
short of length on the pads, pulled but straight to short fine leg
short of length, on the stumps, backs away and pushes it towards long-on
length outside off, dabs it towards short third man
fuller on the stumps, backs away and hits it towards long-off, along the ground
length, angled across, goes back and whips it towards midwicket
length on the stumps, Dunk backs away and lofts it straight over the bowler's head for a maximum
length on the stumps, backs away again but ends up swatting it straight to extra cover
a full toss on the off stump and smashed towards long-off, McCullum fumbles near the boundary but dives to pull it just inside
short of length, pulled towards deep midwicket for a couple
tossed up, slower in the air, Stoinis pushes at it, gets an inside edge on to the pads
too full this time, on middle and leg, Stoinis gets his front leg out and lofts it over wide long-on
another short one, down the leg side, doesn't get the timing right on the pull, a couple to deep backward square leg
fuller around off, looks to go big downtown, gets a thick outside edge, lands short of short third man though
fuller on the stumps, Stoinis was stuck on the back foot, the ball skids off the surface to beat the flick and rap the batsman right in front of the stumps
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards long-on
fuller around off, driven towards long-off for two more
short of length, on the stumps, goes for the pull, one bounce to the fielder at deep midwicket
fuller around off, driven towards mid-off again, a fumble but only a single
a bouncer to end the over with, a bit leg side-ish but not bat on the pull
short of length, down the leg side, flicked towards short fine leg
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but ends up chopping it into the ground, steals a single though
short of length, wide outside off, cuts it towards deep extra cover
short of length, goes back and pulls it in the air but finds deep square leg with almost pin-point accuracy
fuller and wide outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover
length around off, goes back and taps it towards midwicket
length on middle, drags it towards deep backward square leg
short of length on middle, backs away and looks to cut, misses
short of length, backs away and forehands it over midwicket, the long-on fielder comes across to keep it to two
length on middle and leg, moves across and flicks it in the air, almost helping it to Mujeeb at fine leg
short of length, down the leg side, Maddinson moves inside the line of the ball, a late but correct call of wide
length on middle and leg, flicked towards backward square leg
length outside off, moves across and pulls it towards deep square leg
length around off, and spinning in, goes for the sweep but misses, a huge shout for lbw but was heading down
fuller around off, pushes at it, an inside edge on to the pads
short of length, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket
length ball, stays back to push it away, gets hit high on the thigh, the ball was rolling towards the stumps but he kicks it away
length outside off, goes for the cut but gets beaten by the turn
flatter and quicker, cuts it towards short third man, a wayward throw at the non-striker's end results in an overthrow
length around off, skips down the track and looks to clear mid-off, doesn't get it from the middle of the bat, Cutting takes an easy catch at mid-off
fuller around off, stays back and defends it towards the bowler
short of length but down the leg side
fuller around off, pushed towards extra cover for one
fuller around off, Bravo was deep in the crease, flicks it away towards deep square leg
length outside off, forces an outside edge that flies past the keeper for four
beats the bat this time, length again, a hint of away moment, Maddinson was looking to run it down, misses
flatter on the stumps, tucked away towards short midwicket
short of length, goes back to pull it towards square leg
slider around off and middle, Bravo misses the flick, an appeal for lbw but the umpire thinks that was going down
short of length outside off, goes back and lofts it over extra cover, wide of long-off for a couple
length around off, comes forward and defends it back
flatter around off, goes back and guides it towards short third man
down the leg side, looks to flick, looked like it brushed the pad on its way to the keeper
short of length, goes back and taps it towards midwicket
length but angling down the leg side, Maddinson helps it on its way, over the fine boundary for a six
short of length, on middle and leg, punched towards long-on
fuller on the stumps and chipped over mid-on, not the best of the timings, McCullum chases it and pulls it back
a bouncer on middle and leg, Bravo sways down to let it go
fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-off
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards midwicket
length on middle and leg, tucked away towards deep midwicket
length around off, tickled towards short fine leg
fuller around off, backs away and looks to hit over extra cover, ends up slicing it to Lalor at backward point
length ball, spinning in to the batsman who misses the flick and is struck on the pads, going down perhaps
use of feet but Swepson bowls it down the leg side, flicked towards midwicket for a couple
length on middle and leg, tucked away towards short fine leg
length on the stumps, goes for the sweep but misses. Struck right in front and the finger goes up after a delay
length around off, goes back and taps it towards midwicket
length on middle and leg, slower in the air, defended on the front foot
flatter and quicker outside off, looks to force it off the back foot, misses
fuller on the stumps, was looking to flick it on the leg side, a leading edge goes towards extra cover
a wider yorker, steered towards covers for one
a slower one, mistimes it towards midwicket, the fielder is in the deep and the lack of power behind the shot means they come back for the second
a low full toss outside off, Plunkett fails to get the bat on it
length, angled across, Plunkett looks to go aerial, ends up skying it towards long-on where Cutting settles under it
fuller around off, pushes it towards covers for one
fuller on the stumps, goes back and hits it towards midwicket, doesn't get it from the middle of the bat
a full toss around off, pushed towards mid-off
short of length, goes for a swat, mistimed towards deep midwicket
length around off, pulls it towards deep midwicket
length around off, stays back and looks to pull it over long-off, doesn't get the distance and Bryant takes a neat catch
slower one outside off, moves across and looks to scoop, fails to connect
length around off, pushed towards extra cover
length around off, goes aerial but doesn't get the timing right, falls well short of the charging in long-on
length outside off, goes for the pull but ends up slicing it towards backward point, falls short again
fuller on the stumps, chipped towards long-on for a couple
fuller and wider, reaches out to steer it towards backward point
a slower full toss and smashed back past the bowler, beats the man at long-off
fuller on the stumps from around the wicket, digs it out to covers
length on middle and leg, flicked towards square leg
short and way down the leg side, pulled between square leg and short fine leg
flatter around off, on a length, punched towards covers
down the track and drilled to the left of the mid-off fielder
flatter on middle and leg, tucked towards short midwicket
fuller outside off and driven past extra cover for four
length ball, goes for the pull, gets an inside edge towards short third man
down the track and slashes this length ball between cover and point for four, off the mark in some style
fuller around off, pushes it towards extra cover for a quick single
length, Bryant was backing away, the bowler follows him, a cramped pull towards short midwicket
length outside off, hits on the up but the cover fielder makes a diving stop to his left
starts with a dipping full toss on middle, pushed back
flatter and quicker, swatted towards deep midwicket
flatter again, going with the arm, defended from the back foot
down the track, doesn't get the elevation but hits it pretty hard, past the non-striker for four
flatter around off, on a length, goes for the cut but misses
length outside off, goes back and lofts it towards long-off, Maxwell charges in, but it falls just in front of him
length on middle and leg, tucked away towards backward square leg
a bouncer, around off, McCullum ducks under
length on middle and leg, looks to flick but the ball hits him on the thigh and rolls towards square leg
length, angling in, the batsman moves across and chips it over midwicket for four
backs away once again, and looks to pull this length ball, misses
this time it's fuller around off, Bryant moves towards the off side and hits it towards deep midwicket, Maddinson backpedals and take a good catch over his left shoulder
length around off, punched off the back foot towards cover
floated outside off, pushes at it, a thick outside edge towards short third man
fuller around off, forces it towards extra cover, a fumble there but no run
moves across to a fuller one, looks to sweep it from in front of the stumps, misses and is hit on the pad, an easy decision for the umpire
a googly, looks to push it on the leg side, gets an outside edge, falls short of short third man
length around off, goes back and pushes it towards short midwicket
length outside off, pushes at it, gets an outside edge between the keeper and the short third man
length down the leg side, goes for the flick but cannot put bat on the ball
short of length, goes for the pull, the ball hurries on to, a single to square leg
fuller around off, doesn't middle the drive, the ball rolls towards covers
length, pitching outside leg, goes for the flick but misses and is struck on the pad, an appeal for lbw but denied
length on middle and leg, flicked towards deep square leg
fuller around off, driven towards extra cover
length but room outside off, goes for the cut, gets a thick outside edge that races past the short third man
fuller around off, chipped to the left of the bowler who stretches his hands but the ball evades him
short of length, pulled towards deep backward square leg
fuller and wider, driven towards deep extra cover
goes down to sweep this length ball but it bounces extra and hits the batsman on the helmet
looks to go for the reverse sweep to this length ball on the stumps, misses and is hit on the forearm
a reverse sweep to this length, a couple of runs to third man
fuller around off, chipped towards long-on for one
fuller on the pads, clipped towards square leg
fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on, 50 is up with that single
flatter around off, McCullum goes aerial but ends up top-edging it towards long-on, Bravo takes a couple of steps back and pouches a comfortable catch
fuller around off, driven towards long-off for one
a slower yorker from around the wicket, Renshaw adjusts to defend it
a slower one once more, hits it past mid-on, the fielder puts in the chase to keep it to three
short of length outside off and slaps it straight to Maxwell at point, wasn't a great ball but Ross hit it straight to the fielder
fuller on the stumps, pushed back, Bravo gets a hand to it
short of length outside off, balloons to the keeper and given a wide for height
length around off, punches it towards long-on for one
slower one on to the stumps, flicked towards square leg but they don't take the single
fuller around middle, flicked away towards fine leg
length around off, steered fine, beating the man at third man for four
length on middle and leg, flicked towards deep square leg
back of length outside off, steered towards third man for one
length outside off, bends to upper-cut it, misses
length on middle and leg, flicked behind square for another single
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards wide long-on
length around middle, pushed gently towards long-on for a couple
floated outside off, driven to long-off
short of length, pulled towards deep midwicket for two
fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on
pitched up on middle and leg and worked away towards deep square leg
length around off, pushed towards short midwicket
length, on the pads, tucked away towards short fine leg
fuller but way down the leg side
length around off, flicked towards square leg, only a single
short of length on the stumps, swivels to pull it behind square
length around off, looks to drive, mistimes it towards the bowler
was looking to sweep first but it's too full outside off, opens the face at the last moment to run it past the keeper
fuller but down the leg side, flicked towards short fine leg
length outside off, goes back and pushes it towards midwicket, scampers back for the second, a direct hit by Maddinson at the keeper's end but Renshaw stretches and drags his bat to be just in
length around off, flicks it towards midwicket once again, only a single though this time
flatter and quicker, cramping the batsman who chops it towards covers
flighted on the stumps, pushes at it, just short of the bowler
flatter around off, stays back and flicks it towards deep midwicket
back of length around off, pushes it towards cover-point
short of length around middle and leg, mistimes a pull towards deep square leg
short of length outside off, swivels to pull it behind square
short of length outside off, punches it towards sweeper cover
length on middle and leg, tickled towards fine leg
short of length, arches back to upper cut it, doesn't get fine enough, one bounce to the third man fielder
a low dipping full toss, turned away towards square leg for a quick single
short of length outside off, punched towards mid-off for a quick single, a direct hit at the bowler's end but Pierson was in
back of length outside off, punches it towards deep cover
a slower yorker, digs it out towards long-on
length around off, smashed towards mid-off, a bit of fumble there results in an easy single
a bouncer outside off, and pulled away towards deep midwicket, the deep square leg fielder cannot get across in time
length ball around leg, looks to reverse paddle it, misses and is hit on the body
fuller on the off stump, digs it out back towards the bowler
almost a yorker on the leg stump, Renshaw falls as he tries to get his feet out, a leg bye to short third man
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards deep point
fuller around off, looks to go big but ends up slicing it wide of long-off
length around off, pulls it towards deep midwicket
length on the stumps, flat-bats it down the ground, a single to long-on. Was in the air but was past Stoinis before he could even react
short of length around middle and pulled away towards square leg boundary, that four gives even more breathing space to Heat
length around off and middle, flicked towards square leg for one more
short of length, looks to ramp it over, gets a thin edge to the keeper
length outside off, steered towards point
length outside off, guided towards third man for one
a yorker on the stumps, digs it out towards short midwicket
length on the pads from around the wicket, misses the flick but gets a leg bye
dropped! Short of length outside off, goes for the cut, but ends up hitting it straight to O'Connell who grasses the chance
a low full toss on the stumps, sweeps it towards deep square leg
length on middle and leg, swats it towards deep square leg, only a single
fuller around off, driven towards long-off for one more
short of length around off, clubbed towards long-on
slower one on the stumps, looks to go over long-on, doesn't get the power behind it and Maxwell takes it easily at long-on
a slower bouncer, goes for the pull but misses, called a wide for height
short of length outside off, dragged towards long-on but only a single
short of length outside off, pulls it towards deep backward square leg
down the leg side, goes for the pull, the ball brushes the gloves and goes to the keeper on one bounce
a slower on, fuller around off, looks to go big but ends up skying it towards mid-off, Jackson Bird settles under
a high full toss on the stumps, slashed towards deep point
slower one down the leg side, Lalor moves across and looks to scoop, cannot get bat on it

another slower one outside leg, Lalor moves outside the line of the ball and looks to hit it towards long-off, misses. Doggett charges down to steal a bye but Lalor is unmoved. An underarm throw to Bravo who breaks the stumps
another slower one on the pads, looks to hoick it away, misses. Will get a leg-bye though
fuller on the stumps, backs away and throws his bat at it, gets it between backward point and short third man for four
length ball, angled across, lofted towards the left of long-off, they come back for the second but that won't do
